data.comment: The match has started at City Ground.
Cyrus Christie is booked for the home team.
In the minute 30, Martyn Waghorn scores to make it 0-1 at City Ground.
The second-half is underway in Nottingham.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Lewis Grabban with Anthony Knockaert.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Lyle Taylor.
Phillip Cocu (Derby County) is making a first change, with Duane Holmes replacing the possibly injured Nathan Byrne.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Tom Lawrence with Louie Sibley. This is the second substitution made today by Phillip Cocu.
Phillip Cocu is making the team's third substitution at City Ground with Kazim replacing Martyn Waghorn.
Harry Arter (Nottingham) has received a first yellow card.
